data.name: URO Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
URO's original soundtrack to send with 40 songs in music!
Available for. mp 3!

Soundtrack's song data is generated in the name of "URO_OST" in your Steam Library and URO folder.

【DLC in Music】

data.short_description: URO's original soundtrack to send with 40 songs in music! Available for. mp 3! Soundtrack's song data is generated in the name of "URO_OST" in your Steam Library and URO folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsVista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
